version_description:
. Add Cryptocurrency Top List in AR.
. Add Top Buy Sell Money Flow in AR.
. Overall improvement.

. Add Cryptocurrency Top List in AR.
. Add Top Buy Sell Money Flow in AR.
. Overall improvement.

. Improve annotations on stock and options charts.
. Add My Watchlist price change in AR.

. Improve annotations on stock and options charts.
. Add My Watchlist price change in AR.

. Enhance market in AR (augmented reality). You can move a chart, pinch zoom in & out, choose to display or hide the title of the chart, change title color, and so on. Lots of fun!
. Improve advanced stock chart.

. Enhance market in AR (augmented reality). You can move a chart, pinch zoom in & out, choose to display or hide the title of the chart, change title color, and so on. Lots of fun!
. Improve advanced stock chart.

. Improve market in augmented reality.
. Enhance in-app messaging.

. Improve market in augmented reality.
. Enhance in-app messaging.

. Improve Big Money Options, IV Chart, and Top IV Scanners for easier navigation.
. Improve stock chart for default line type in annotation.

. Improve Big Money Options, IV Chart, and Top IV Scanners for easier navigation.
. Improve stock chart for default line type in annotation.

Latest update:
1. Improve market in AR.
2. Bug fix and overall improvement.

Recent update:
1. Augmented Reality. Stock price charts with AR are improved. Now you can even view several stock price charts in a watchlist at the same time through your device's screen.
2. Unusual Volume Stocks. We statistically scan unusual volume stocks real-time through the trading hours. Big volume change usually tells something important is going on with a stock. (Premium Plan or above)
3. Fundamental Scores. We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (Premium Plan or above)
4. Portfolio. Portfolio importing was fixed and we now support importing from some well-known brokers.

. Optimize watchlist and portfolio.
. Overall improvement.

1. Improve market in AR.
2. Bug fix and overall improvement.

Recent update:
1. Augmented Reality. Stock price charts with AR are improved. Now you can even view several stock price charts in a watchlist at the same time through your device's screen.
2. Unusual Volume Stocks. We statistically scan unusual volume stocks real-time through the trading hours. Big volume change usually tells something important is going on with a stock. (Premium Plan or above)
3. Fundamental Scores. We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (Premium Plan or above)
4. Portfolio. Portfolio importing was fixed and we now support importing from some well-known brokers.

. Optimize watchlist and portfolio.
. Overall improvement.

. Fix a bug of adding cash position in portfolio.
. Overall performance enhancements.

. Fix a bug of adding cash position in portfolio.
. Overall performance enhancements.
. Support the value weighted chart of Portfolio in Augmented Reality (AR).
. Support the value weighted chart of Portfolio in Augmented Reality (AR).
. Enhancement for "My Portfolio" in AR (Augmented Reality).
. Enhancement for "My Portfolio" in AR (Augmented Reality).

. View stock price chart with Augmented Reality.
. Enhance options flow grid with more customizable settings. Maximum threshold is increased from 10,000 to 30,000.
. Improve annotations on stock and options chart.

. View stock price chart with Augmented Reality.
. Enhance options flow grid with more customizable settings. Maximum threshold is increased from 10,000 to 30,000.
. Improve annotations on stock and options chart.

Many exciting new features and enhancements made with our hard work. Hope you enjoy them.
- [Augmented Reality] Stock price charts with AR are improved. Now you can even view several stock price charts in a watchlist at the same time through your device's screen.
- [Unusual Volume Stocks] We statistically scan unusual volume stocks real-time through the trading hours. Big volume change usually tells something important is going on with a stock. (Premium Plan or above)
- [Fundamental Scores] We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (Premium Plan or above)
- [Portfolio] Portfolio importing was fixed and we now support importing from some well-known brokers.

Many exciting new features and enhancements made with our hard work. Hope you enjoy them.
- [Augmented Reality] Stock price charts with AR are improved. Now you can even view several stock price charts in a watchlist at the same time through your device's screen.
- [Unusual Volume Stocks] We statistically scan unusual volume stocks real-time through the trading hours. Big volume change usually tells something important is going on with a stock. (Premium Plan or above)
- [Fundamental Scores] We analyze hundreds of fundamental indicators and many pieces of information of a stock and generate FA scores for the stock and its relative strength in the overall market. (Premium Plan or above)
- [Portfolio] Portfolio importing was fixed and we now support importing from some well-known brokers.

1. Add Options Power Indicator. It indicates options' energy in a certain time frame and reveals the underlying buy / sell power of options activities. Green color means positive power (bullish signal) and red color means negative power (bearish signal). (Under "Research", for Pro Plus subscriber)
2. Improve market in Augmented Reality (AR).

. Improve stock and cryptocurrency heat map with Augmented Reality (AR).

. Add "TA Score" for stocks. Our smart system automatically performs a technical analysis everyday and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. You can check the overall TA strength of a stock, plus breakdown scores of different categories. (subscription)
. Able to save the layout for various charts and displays with Augmented Reality. Next time when you enter AR, easily restore from your saved layout with one tap. Stock market with AR has never been this easy and fast!
. Improve Crypto Heat Map and Nasdaq Heat Map with AR.
. Improve cryptocurrency price chart with AR.
. Enhance stock price chart with AR.

. Add options money flow alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (Pro Plus Plan / Pro Plan)

. Add options money flow alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (Pro Plus Plan / Pro Plan)

Now you can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom.
. Add "Note Board"; able to share notes.

Recent update:
Add powerful options money flow alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (Pro Plus Plan / Pro Plan)

Now you can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom.

Recent update:
Add powerful options money flow alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (Pro Plus Plan / Pro Plan)

Latest update:
1. Improve "Market" view and "Research" view.
2. Add Stock Money Flow Alert. You can set and receive alert push notifications when positive accumulated money flow of the current day turns negative or when negative accumulated money flow of the current day turns positive for a stock. (Pro Plus plan)
3. Add ICO Calendar, a good ICO watch list for cryptocurrency players. View rich information for various Initial Coin Offerings. Check detailed information of the coins and tokens like the key figures, team members, descriptions, and more. (Essential plan)

Recent update:
. Add powerful options money flow alert. Set and receive alert push notifications when million $ call and put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional. (Pro Plus Plan / Pro Plan)
. Add "Note Board". You can set your stock notes as public or private notes, so you could share the wisdom.

1. Improve money flow alert for stocks.
2. Add Cryptocurrency top list, which supports BTC market, ETH market, and USD market.
3. Add Crypto Top Rank Change list. Live tracking of crypto top rank gainers, top rank losers, newly rise into top 100, top 50, top 20, etc. (subscription)
4. Add website link for coins and tokens.

Latest Updates:
1. Improve portfolio with enhanced stock and options holding positions.
2. Easy to add additional stock purchase to an existing position. The app will calculate the average cost price and the total number of shares for you.
3. Compare TA Scores (technical analysis score) of stocks in your watch-list with one-tap.
4. Quickly compare FA Scores (fundamental analysis score) of multiple stocks in a watch-list.
5. Tap on an individual stock in the comparison view, and get further details of TA / FA Score of the stock.
6. Enhance Dividend Calendar.

Recent Updates:
. Set and receive alerts for Unusual Options Flow activities.
. Set and receive alerts for Stock Money flow.

Latest Updates:
1. Add "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis score of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. (subscription)
2. Create multiple smart watch-lists. Smart Watchlist automatically syncs across devices and you could receive intelligent alerts for stocks in your smart watch-lists. (subscription)
3. Easily view FA Scores (fundamental analysis score) and TA Scores (technical analysis score) of all stocks in your smart watch-list with one-tap.
4. Quickly compare FA Scores and TA Scores of multiple stock holding positions in your portfolio. Our smart system automatically performs technical analysis and generates a diagnostic report based on many indicators. Know the strength of your stocks compared in the overall market. (subscription)
5. Improve "Dividend Distribution" for a portfolio holding position.
6. Enhance "Close Position" in a portfolio.

. Set and receive alerts for Unusual Options Flow activities.

Latest Updates:
1. Enhance "Top Stocks of FA Score". Scan and view the stocks with top fundamental analysis scores of all US market, S&P 500, Nasdaq 100, NYSE, and AMEX. Tap each stock to see more details. (pro plus / pro plan subscription)
2. Perform fundamental and technical analysis of holding positions in your portfolio, watch-list, and smart watchlist with one tap. Compare and generate fundamental analysis and technical analysis score reports of up to 100 symbols at once. Know the strengths and weaknesses of your portfolio and watchlist. (premium / pro / pro plus plan subscription).

4. Overall improvement.

Latest Updates:
1. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc. (pro / pro plus plan)
2. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional. (pro / pro plus plan)
3. Enhance "Implied Volatility" under "Research" tab.
4. Quickly view Intraday IV Chart and Historical Daily IV Chart from "Implied Volatility".
5. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Pro" tab.
6. Improve "Market" view.

. Added historical scan of Unusual OI (market). You could go to a scanner and tap the date selection button on the top right corner. View scanning results of up to 14 calendar days. (pro plus / pro plan)

Latest Updates:
. Improve the speed and overall performance.

Latest Updates:
. Improve the speed and overall performance.

Recent Updates:
. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc.

Latest Updates:
1. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Market" tab with stocks you like to watch. Swipe left there and tap settings button to do the customization. Quickly view stock details by tapping the market bar.
2. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
3. The app remembers the threshold value you set for each underlying symbol in Options Flow Grid. Easier for you to customize your scanning and filtering of options activities.
4. Add Stock Money Flow Alert (last 30 minutes). You can set and receive alert push notifications when positive accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns negative or when negative accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns positive for a stock. (pro plus plan)
5. Improve Earnings Calendar.
6. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.
7. Continue to optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.

Recent Updates:
. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc.

. Enhance "Implied Volatility" under "Research" tab.
. Quickly view Intraday IV Chart and Historical Daily IV Chart from "Implied Volatility".
. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Pro" tab.

Latest Updates:
1. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Market" tab with stocks you like to watch. Swipe left there and tap settings button to do the customization. Quickly view stock details by tapping the market bar.
2. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
3. The app remembers the threshold value you set for each underlying symbol in Options Flow Grid. Easier for you to customize your scanning and filtering of options activities.
4. Add Stock Money Flow Alert (last 30 minutes). You can set and receive alert push notifications when positive accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns negative or when negative accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns positive for a stock. (pro plus plan)
5. Improve Earnings Calendar.
6. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.
7. Continue to optimize for iPhone XS, XS Max, XR and iOS 12.

Recent Updates:
. In addition to million $ call / put options money flow alert, now you can set and receive alerts when > $250K call or put options activity happens for a stock. Could be directional or nondirectional like buy-flow, sell-flow, etc.
. Add $500K call and put options money flow alert, both directional or non-directional.
. Enhance "Implied Volatility" under "Research" tab.
. Quickly view Intraday IV Chart and Historical Daily IV Chart from "Implied Volatility".
. Easily change the underlying stock symbol and view corresponding IV charts in "Intraday IV Chart" and "Historical Daily IV Chart" under "Pro" tab.

Latest Updates:
1. Improve options chain.
2. Add multiple options contracts to watchlist at one time. (essential plan)
3. Able to sort money flow scanner results by symbol and money flow amount.

Recent Updates:
. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Market" tab with stocks you like to watch. Swipe left there and tap settings button to do the customization. Quickly view stock details by tapping the market bar.
. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.
. The app remembers the threshold value you set for each underlying symbol in Options Flow Grid. Easier for you to customize your scanning and filtering of options activities.
. Add Stock Money Flow Alert (last 30 minutes). You can set and receive alert push notifications when positive accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns negative or when negative accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns positive for a stock.

Latest Updates:
1. Improve options chain.
2. Add multiple options contracts to watchlist at one time. (essential plan)
3. Able to sort money flow scanner results by symbol and money flow amount.

Recent Updates:
. Personalize "Market Bar" in the top section of "Market" tab with stocks you like to watch. Swipe left there and tap settings button to do the customization. Quickly view stock details by tapping the market bar.
. Enhance symbol auto completion in "Research" tab. This feature gives some suggestions based on what you input. Those are just suggestions. If you don't see a stock you are looking for, that does not mean the stock cannot be found. As long as you enter the correct symbol, you could tap the blue "Go" button on the keyboard and proceed to the stock detail view.

. Add Stock Money Flow Alert (last 30 minutes). You can set and receive alert push notifications when positive accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns negative or when negative accumulated money flow of the last 30 minutes turns positive for a stock.

Latest Updates:
1. Personalize options chain and select specific call / put strikes you'd like to view. Unselected strikes won't show in the options chain any more. You can manage the settings any time and stay focused on what you are interested in. This feature is especially useful for underlying assets with large amount of strikes like AAPL, SPY, etc.
2. Add Stock VWAP charts. Volume-Weighted Average Price (VWAP) is plotted as an "overlay" indicator on stock charts. VWAP reflects price levels weighted by volume, and helps you to identify liquidity points, determine the intraday trend, determine relative value, and measure trading efficiency. (Pro Plan & above)
3. Continue to improve the speed and overall performance.

1. Add "FA History Chart" in "Research". View stocks' historical charts of many fundamental analysis indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. (premium plan & above)
2. Enhance "FA Score". Besides the score, you can also check the values of several FA indicators like P/E, P/B, P/S, ROA, ROE, ROIC, D/E, Gross Margin, EBITDA Margin, Net Margin, etc. Know the good and the bad of the indicators.
3. Add interactive sector chart of portfolio. Enter a portfolio, tap the summary view or the action button on the top right corner and choose "Sector Chart". Quickly view the sector composition of a portfolio. Great for rebalancing and equity
sector allocation.
4. View the recent performance chart of each portfolio for up to 1 month. More chart style is added.
5. Overall improvement.

6. Improved the stock chart in "Research" tab.
7. Improved the user interface of IPO calendar.
8. Overall improvement.

1. Improved Earnings Calendar and Dividend Calendar.
2. Able to add additional purchase for options holding positions in a portfolio. (Tap the options position, choose "Add Additional Purchase" from the menu.)
3. Able to add all stocks in Top Buy Sell Money Flow Scanners to a watchlist with one tap.
4. Check next earnings dates for all stocks in a watchlist with one tap. (Tap the action button on the top right and choose from the menu. Dates shown are tentative and subject to change and availability without notice.)
5. Added "Filter by Portfolio" in Daily Hotlist, Real-Time Top Mover, Earnings Calendar, and Dividend Calendar. Using the filter, you can focus on the stocks currently in your portfolios and all other results are excluded.
6. Fixed a rare instance where the keyboard covers part of the symbol auto completion search tip in "Market" and "Research" tab.
7. Enhanced app performance.

Latest Updates:
1. Added Options Power in "Options Money Flow" section in "Pro" tab. Options Power indicates options' energy in a certain time frame. Green color means positive power (bullish signal) and red color means negative power (bearish signal).
2. Improved Top Buy Sell Money Flow, Market and Sector in "Pro" tab.
3. Improved Dividend History in "Research" tab.
4. Enhanced Earnings Calendar.
